availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jeremiah F. Pittman (Trimble and Henderson Co. Merchant)

body.p: Henderson and Trimble County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Myrtilla H. Cook Pittman in Trimble County on May 24, 1847. Constable in Trimble County, Kentucky in 1847. Merchant in Henderson County, Kentucky in 1850. Gentleman in Henderson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, District 1, p. 290B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 2, p. 181.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, Bedford, p. 198A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Trimble County Marriages.
Taliaferro P. Shaffner, ed., The Kentucky State Register, for the Year 1847 (Louisville: Morton & Griswold, 1847), 158.
